description:
Description

As we age, we produce less collagen and elastin, making it harder for our skin to bounce back. Our complete set anti wrinkle patches includes face wrinkle patches to help reduce the appearance of frown lines, crow’s feet, smile lines, forehead wrinklesOur product is a natural product that has proven to have minor wrinkle improvement properties through clinical trials and has been certified as harmless to leather irritation.Vegan Wrinkle Treatment: Try facial patches as an alternative to Botox while sleeping 4 to 8 hours a day. Help reverse the effects of sun damage, lifestyle and aging with our comfortable premium facial and peri-eye patches for forehead wrinkle treatment.
How To Use
1. After washing your face, apply skincare products and let them fully absorb.

2. Remove oil from the areas where you will apply the patch, such as between the eyebrows and nasolabial folds.

3. Remove the patch from the film, spread it over the desired area with your hand, and then attach the patch.

4. Leave it on for 4-8 hours to allow the active ingredients to be fully absorbed.

Tips
*Adjust the patch application time according to your skin condition.
*When removing the patch, wet it thoroughly and slowly peel it off to avoid irritating your skin.

reviews.title: You Just Get 1 Pack
reviews.content: The advertising is misleading. They make you think you're getting a sampling of all of the products. What showed up was just 1 random pack! There was no selection, either. If I'd gone to add the product to my cart, and it asked me to select just 1, I wouldn't have purchased. But they let the purchase go through, therefore continuing to let me believe you get all of the product pictured. Also, what a ripoff! $14-$16 for 32 patches? Umm... no. I've bought so many brands, and you can get over 200 patches for under $10. I only ordered 1 and ended up being sent 2, and got charged about $15 EACH! That might be a site issue, but still... Expensive. The patches themselves were really hard to get off the sheet, and would often fold. I've never had this issue with other brands. I think the company believes their name will earn them customers or something, when the product is subpar and overpriced. Feels scammy of your ask me.

The two-step pore care is provided in one pack.

How To Use
1. After cleansing, apply the bubble pack to concerned areas with enlarged pores and dead skin cells, including cheeks and nose. 
2. Leave it on for 2-3 minutes until bubble comes up. Then, rinse thoroughly. 
3. Wipe out your skin with a toner and pat it into skin completely before using the patch. 
4. Do not touch the center of the patch when peeling off the protective film. 
5. Press the patch vertically with your fingers and don’t push to attach it.

reviews.title: Skincare essential for breakouts
reviews.content: I’ve been using the COSRX Acne Pimple Master Patch for several months now, and it’s become an indispensable part of my skincare routine. These hydrocolloid patches are incredibly effective at reducing the size and redness of pimples overnight. They adhere well to the skin and stay in place throughout the night, even if you toss and turn. What I appreciate most is how discreet they are; the transparent design makes them barely noticeable, so I can even wear them during the day if needed. They also prevent me from picking at blemishes, which has helped reduce scarring. While they work best on whiteheads, I’ve found that they also help with inflamed pimples by reducing swelling. Overall, the COSRX Acne Pimple Master Patch is a reliable and effective solution for managing breakouts. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a simple yet powerful acne treatment.
